channel.title: BlazeScape Reborn
channel.description:
Well, I've been working on this server for a LONG time. I've done a lot of good things and I'd like to keep doing good things with it. I'll post proggies.
[size=14pt]Client-Side:[/size] -Added Jframe [b]-Added JTextArea instead of black CMD box[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2yvrmds.png[/img]
[b]-Added Godwars items, Donator's cape, Third Age, God bows, Slayer helmet, skill sets[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/xf2aeu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1zcpok1.png[/img] -Added Icon to the Jframe -Added custom music & sounds packet -Added button to STOP all music and sounds from playing -Added HP Over head's being able to be toggled on and off -Changed up the gameframe. Thanks to my gfx mod for the new one
[b]-Added the Equipment interface[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2yl1rtx.png[/img]
[b]-Added God Wars map[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/35d8c9c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2s0fdif.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2807dkz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2jb09zc.png[/img]
[b]-Added my own God Wars map[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/fnes9l.png[/img]
[b]-Added my Football Field map[/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2m33i4w.png[/img]
-Added all of the godwars npcs and animations -Added godsword stances and lots of other animations -Added 2 more crowns, one for rights 3 and one for rights 4 -Added crowns beside names in the spot where you type(credits to the Frozen Age guy) -Added flashing rainbow @color@ -PROBABLY MORE, CAN'T THINK OF THEM ATM
[size=14pt]Server Sided:[/size] [b]-Added Woodcutting, about 90%[/b] -Stumps -Respawns -Random amount of logs per tree -Accurate amount of time to cut tree per log depending on level and axe [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/jagf1i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ih2vjb.png[/img]
[b]-Added Mining, about 90%[/b] -Gray Rocks -Respawns -Correct amount of ore per rock and some get a random int + the default -Accurate amount of time to mine the rock depending on level and pick [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/281yfqa.png[/img]
[b]-Added Fishing, about 80%[/b] -Correct spots to correct fish -Requires right equipment -Correct delays [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j5jeco.png[/img]
[b]-Added Runecrafting, 90%[/b] -Correct runes at correct altars -Multiple runes at higher levels [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2iqe4io.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/biw1zl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/257f2na.png[/img]
[b]-Added Slayer, 90%[/b] -Gives tasks low/high depending on combat level -Gives a random amount needed to kill for a task from an array -Gives a random npc needed to kill for a task from an array -Detects when you've killed all required npcs for your task and sends a message [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/okcwhj.png[/img]
[b]-Added NPC clipping, 90%[/b] -Can't clip on most angles, sometimes get's through -Ability to change tiles from walkable to unwalkable through a file [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15x1qx.png[/img]
[b]-Added Music playing through different places[/b] -Eiffel 65's Blue plays when you teleport to the Training Tower -Eye of the Tiger plays when you go to the main part of godwars where you get kills -Pokemon healing sound(when you go to nurse joy) plays when you pray at an altar, then the other music you had returns -Welcome music stops when you log in and Microsoft Sam says Welcome -Welcome music resumes on logout
[b]-Added Staff Zone[/b] -Has thrones and chairs from Construction, all which can be sat in -Has a larder which gives you a beer glass -Has a beer keg which when used with a beer glass gives you a beer
[b]-98% range[/b] -Ranger's no longer always get the last hit on an npc via a check for NPC health -Added a check for arrows -Requires the correct arrows per bow -All bows require the correct arrows -Dark bow double hits -Crystal bow and God bows do not require arrows
[b]-98% melee skills[/b] -All required things, matches very closely to RuneScape -2% is just wiggle room
[b]-Warrior's Guild[/b] -Objects load on minimap, although they aren't the actual objects -Animated armour says "I'M ALIVE!" and walks to you -No one else can attack your Animated armour -Animated armour gives tokens and drops it's armour -Cyclops drop defenders according to the one you have. It drops the one above that. -You lose tokens while in the cyclops room [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2569yfs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2hqb3n6.png[/img]
[b]-Giant Mole, 20%[/b] -Dig on the mole hill to get to his lair -Spawned Giant Mole -Spawned some baby moles -Has correct drops [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/30izxhw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sor9j4.png[/img]
[b]-Cannot attack through walls[/b] -This has been fixed due to people using the clipping to their advantage, not getting attacked etc
[b]-Cannot attack Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin gods unless you're in their chambers[/b] -Same thing as above, plus people would range them out so they wouldn't need the killcount [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vrtldl.png[/img]
[b]-Barrows, 90%[/b] -Kill all brother's except 1 to be able to go down to the tunnels -Last brother is random -Must kill some npcs in the tunnels at the bottom to get to the chest in the middle -Chest awards randomly, runes, potions and other things with your barrows piece, or pieces -Verac hits through prayer -Dharok hits higher, the lower his health is -Ahrim attacks with magic -Karil attacks with range -If you teleport to home to bank or anything, your killcount resets [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zp7aeo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1qnbbs.png[/img]

item.title: BlazeScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

…What the hell?

Who dug up this topic?

Last reply:
« Reply #15 on: March 03, 2010, 04:52:04 PM »

I, Corey, the Lead Developer of BlazeScape shut this server down long ago after Cocoa left. Now I’m starting up something else. If you know the website url, go there for more info.

Read full topic

item.title: BlazeScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Xlez Xlez
item.description:
@Xlez wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:7, topic:331139”][quote author=Lin link=topic=427505.msg3139885#msg3139885 date=1267394514]
Ugly-as-balls game frame with just about every other custom image you have on there. The server features are nice though. The client is ugly enough to make me not want to play it ever though.
[/quote]yep
Everyone always says it’s ugly but I think it’s just because you’re not used to seeing different gameframes than runescape’s gameframe.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: BlazeScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

red is NOT good for a gameframe…

its been proven colors have impacts on moods, and in red’s case, it provokes rage…

not to mention looking at red all the time would just sicken me… gray is good because its neutral and just goes well…

Read full topic

item.title: BlazeScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Kihomura:

i prefer the old blazescape gameframe over this one. this one is just two runescape gameframes that were photoshopped to look light red

A lot of people like this one better than the old one.
I really want to keep it/get a brand new one that isn’t red.

Read full topic

item.title: BlazeScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:7, topic:331139”][quote author=Lin link=topic=427505.msg3139885#msg3139885 date=1267394514]
Ugly-as-balls game frame with just about every other custom image you have on there. The server features are nice though. The client is ugly enough to make me not want to play it ever though.
[/quote]
Everyone always says it’s ugly but I think it’s just because you’re not used to seeing different gameframes than runescape’s gameframe.[/quote]No. It’s because I know what colors go good together, and most of the stuff here isn’t easy on the eyes. It really doesn’t fit with the rest of the game and it looks horrible.

Read full topic

item.title: BlazeScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Well, I’ve been working on this server for a LONG time. I’ve done a lot of good things and I’d like to keep doing good things with it. I’ll post proggies.

[size=14pt]Client-Side:[/size]
-Added Jframe
-Added JTextArea instead of black CMD box

-Added Godwars items, Donator’s cape, Third Age, God bows, Slayer helmet, skill sets

xf2aeu.png773×559

1zcpok1.png773×559

-Added Icon to the Jframe
-Added custom music & sounds packet
-Added button to STOP all music and sounds from playing
-Added HP Over head’s being able to be toggled on and off
-Changed up the gameframe. Thanks to my gfx mod for the new one

-Added the Equipment interface

2yl1rtx.png773×559

-Added God Wars map

35d8c9c.png773×559

2s0fdif.png773×559

2807dkz.png773×559

2jb09zc.png773×559

-Added my own God Wars map

fnes9l.png773×559

-Added my Football Field map

2m33i4w.png773×559

-Added all of the godwars npcs and animations
-Added godsword stances and lots of other animations
-Added 2 more crowns, one for rights 3 and one for rights 4
-Added crowns beside names in the spot where you type(credits to the Frozen Age guy)
-Added flashing rainbow @color@
-PROBABLY MORE, CAN’T THINK OF THEM ATM

[size=14pt]Server Sided:[/size]
-Added Woodcutting, about 90%
-Stumps
-Respawns
-Random amount of logs per tree
-Accurate amount of time to cut tree per log depending on level and axe

jagf1i.png773×559

2ih2vjb.png773×559

-Added Mining, about 90%
-Gray Rocks
-Respawns
-Correct amount of ore per rock and some get a random int + the default
-Accurate amount of time to mine the rock depending on level and pick

281yfqa.png773×559

-Added Fishing, about 80%
-Correct spots to correct fish
-Requires right equipment
-Correct delays

2j5jeco.png773×559

-Added Runecrafting, 90%
-Correct runes at correct altars
-Multiple runes at higher levels

2iqe4io.png773×559

biw1zl.png773×559

257f2na.png773×559

-Added Slayer, 90%
-Gives tasks low/high depending on combat level
-Gives a random amount needed to kill for a task from an array
-Gives a random npc needed to kill for a task from an array
-Detects when you’ve killed all required npcs for your task and sends a message

okcwhj.png773×559

-Added NPC clipping, 90%
-Can’t clip on most angles, sometimes get’s through
-Ability to change tiles from walkable to unwalkable through a file

15x1qx.png773×559

-Added Music playing through different places
-Eiffel 65’s Blue plays when you teleport to the Training Tower
-Eye of the Tiger plays when you go to the main part of godwars where you get kills
-Pokemon healing sound(when you go to nurse joy) plays when you pray at an altar, then the other music you had returns
-Welcome music stops when you log in and Microsoft Sam says Welcome
-Welcome music resumes on logout

-Added Staff Zone
-Has thrones and chairs from Construction, all which can be sat in
-Has a larder which gives you a beer glass
-Has a beer keg which when used with a beer glass gives you a beer

-98% range
-Ranger’s no longer always get the last hit on an npc via a check for NPC health
-Added a check for arrows
-Requires the correct arrows per bow
-All bows require the correct arrows
-Dark bow double hits
-Crystal bow and God bows do not require arrows

-98% melee skills
-All required things, matches very closely to RuneScape
-2% is just wiggle room

-Warrior’s Guild
-Objects load on minimap, although they aren’t the actual objects
-Animated armour says “I’M ALIVE!” and walks to you
-No one else can attack your Animated armour
-Animated armour gives tokens and drops it’s armour
-Cyclops drop defenders according to the one you have. It drops the one above that.
-You lose tokens while in the cyclops room

2569yfs.png773×559

2hqb3n6.png773×559

-Giant Mole, 20%
-Dig on the mole hill to get to his lair
-Spawned Giant Mole
-Spawned some baby moles
-Has correct drops

30izxhw.png773×559

sor9j4.png773×559

-Cannot attack through walls
-This has been fixed due to people using the clipping to their advantage, not getting attacked etc

-Cannot attack Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin gods unless you’re in their chambers
-Same thing as above, plus people would range them out so they wouldn’t need the killcount

2vrtldl.png773×559

-Barrows, 90%
-Kill all brother’s except 1 to be able to go down to the tunnels
-Last brother is random
-Must kill some npcs in the tunnels at the bottom to get to the chest in the middle
-Chest awards randomly, runes, potions and other things with your barrows piece, or pieces
-Verac hits through prayer
-Dharok hits higher, the lower his health is
-Ahrim attacks with magic
-Karil attacks with range
-If you teleport to home to bank or anything, your killcount resets

1zp7aeo.png773×559

1qnbbs.png773×559

Read full topic
